name: Mekong River Crossing
description:
How to Play

Play in fullscreen mode !

Use A and D keys to move.

Be careful, the difficulty increases over time

Try and beat your highscore!

Try to safely cross as many passengers over the busy mekong river!

One Man Project

Coding, Modeling, Effects, and Soundtrack and a few Soundeffects made by me.

I will be posting breakdowns of some features,

if anything interests you in particular,  please let me know in the comments.

Soundtrack: Coming to Youtube soon.
